basicInfo.parentCompany: Independent (privately held; founded by Michael Herpich and Michael Bolke as Giga-International, rebranded to Contabo 2013)
basicInfo.notes: Founded in 2003 in Munich, Germany by Michael Herpich and Michael Bolke. Originally named Giga-International, rebranded to Contabo in 2013. Team of ~300 people. 11 data center locations across 9 regions on 4 continents. Cloud VPS 30 ranked #1 best-performing VPS in 2025 by HOSTtest. Focus on high-performance servers at budget prices.

pricing.moneyBackExclusions: 14-day cancellation period; Most setup fees non-refundable once server deployed

policiesOverages.accountSuspensionPolicy: Violation of ToS; non-payment; abuse reports
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Network abuse; spam; illegal activities; cryptocurrency mining on some plans
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: No renewal markup (consistent pricing); No cPanel included; No managed services; Snapshots may cost extra; Support response times can be slow; Backups are manual; Some setup fees on dedicated servers

contentRestrictions.contentNotes: German provider - follows German/EU law; relatively permissive

editorial.knownIssues: Support response times can be slow and inconsistent; No managed services; No cPanel included; Some users report downtime issues (26-hour outage reported); Policies described as inconsistent; No phone support 24/7; Backups are manual only; Interface less polished than competitors
editorial.bestFor: Budget-conscious users wanting high specs at low price; Developers comfortable with unmanaged servers; Users needing lots of RAM/storage cheaply; Long-term projects where value matters most; Users who don't need premium support
editorial.avoidIf: Need reliable 24/7 support; Want managed WordPress; Require consistent uptime; Beginner requiring hand-holding; Need included cPanel; Critical applications requiring premium reliability
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Best specs per dollar (8GB RAM for $4.95); 32TB bandwidth (most generous); #1 ranked VPS 2025; Trustpilot 4.2 decent but support criticized; No renewal markup; 11 locations global; Cheaper than Hetzner for same specs; Support worse than Linode/DO; Own infrastructure

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Highest specs per dollar with 8GB RAM VPS for under $5/month and 32TB bandwidth
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Developer or tech user wanting maximum specs at minimum cost who doesn't need premium support

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: Contabo offers the best specs per dollar in the industry - 8GB RAM VPS for under $5/month. Their Cloud VPS 30 was ranked #1 VPS in 2025. However, support quality is inconsistent and there are no managed services.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: Contabo is an independent German company founded by Michael Herpich and Michael Bolke in 2003. Originally named Giga-International, it rebranded to Contabo in 2013.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: Contabo VPS starts at €4.50/month for 8GB RAM with no renewal increase. Dedicated servers from €64.99/month. 32TB bandwidth included.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: No, Contabo is for technical users. There's no cPanel, no managed services, and support can be slow. Beginners should consider managed hosting alternatives.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: No, Contabo VPS/dedicated servers do not include email hosting. You must configure your own mail server.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, but it's completely unmanaged. You install and maintain WordPress yourself with no automated tools.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: Contabo guarantees 99.9% uptime, though some users have reported extended outages. Perfect uptime recorded in Q3 2025 by HOSTtest.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, with a 14-day cancellation period. Monthly billing is available. Setup fees on dedicated servers may not be refunded.
